message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $100.  I believe this product will be a great value for you at that price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $95 would be a fair price for both of us. Can you meet me at that price?
